overview: Andro has been trained since his early days to become a cold blooded assassin. He has been trained by a corps of other assassins and hit men from a secret society. The leader of this organization is known as 'Anubis'. to prevent any murderer of this society to live instinctively Anubis decides to kill every hit man at the age of 28. by conditions Andra picks up this valuable information and needs to find a way to live with this whether he likes it or not.
title: Andromeda
